entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add `IUnaryReciprocalOperators<TSelf, TResult>` to `INumber<TSelf,TResult>` #65939
  • Review workaround for ProcessEvent when event source is disabled #65938
  • `genStructPutArgUnroll` will go out of bounds on mis-sized struct loads #65937
    7.0.0
  • `fgMorphMultiregStructArg` does not check layout compatibility when morphing stack args to `FIELD_LIST` #65936
    7.0.0
  • Review workaround for TailCallStress mode #65934
  • Review workaround for bad IBC data causing official build failures on macOS #65933
  • Review skipped test case for regex scanner with \c[ pattern #65931
    7.0.0
  • Review workaround for IsolatedStorageFile dependency on System.Security.Policy.Evidence #65930
  • Review workaround for Named mutex: Use flock instead of pthread process-shared mutex #65929
  • Why doesn't PriorityQueue have the Remove(TElement element) method #65928
  • [API Proposal]: Add overload of ToDictionary that turns an IEnumerable of KeyValuePair or ValueTuple #65925

Closed

  • Cleanup Issue-URLs in Code #63902
  • Review workaround for HalfToInt16Bits and Int16BitsToHalf in Cbor #65935
  • Unexpected behavior with LayoutKind.Sequential on generic struct #65923
  • Not able to trap the LifetimeEventsHostedService on Windows Shutdown or Restart #59246
    7.0.0
  • Consider removing goto statements on Regex source-generated code #62657
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Update stale comments that reference GitHub issues #65932
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • FastMod for EEHashTable (Faster virtual generics) #65926
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable libraries GCStress pipeline #65924
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • `ZeroObj` assertions #65257
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Change regex source generator to emit returns rather than jumps to NoMatch #65599
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Add support for Windows IO completions to the portable thread pool #64834
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Avoid Attribute.GetCustomAttributes() returning null for open generic type #65237
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Allow AOTing methods with catch/filter clauses. #64867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Repair inconsistent nullability nullability on TypeConverter (#63186) #63874
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

Issues

Updated

  • Champion: Simplified parameter null validation code #2145

  • [Proposal]: Roles and extensions #5497
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Cancel Async Functions Without Throw #4565

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Pattern matching error leads to MSB6006 "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 #59804
  • "csc.exe" exited with code -1066598274 #59799

Closed

  • CS0403, CS0037, CS8978 - Null assignment to nullable generic types #59805
  • Odd suggested parameter names in some cases #36364
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix IDE0051 not working when using nameof() (#54972) #59803
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Push the two-step navigation system further through roslyn. #59802
    Area-IDE
  • Update go-to-def handler to support entirely async go-to-def operation. #59801
    Area-IDE
  • Solution crawler options #59800
    Area-IDE
  • Change navigation helpers to operate in two steps. #59798
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fixed odd naming suggestions #59674
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Remove unnecessary accesses on XML end tag #59771
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #59797
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #59796
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Make the IDocumentNavigationSerivice entirely async. #59784
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #59795
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • AnalyzeDataFlow: Added missing handling for delegate construction from extension method #59745
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid binding lambdas unnecessarily in some error scenarios #59733
    Area-Compilers
  • Produce specific error for misplaced 'record' keyword #59622
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Records
  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Removed navigation target and navigation hint from namespaces #59793
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Initial implementation of a new 'lightweight' background-work-indicator that we can use in-situ in the editor. #59759
    Area-IDE
  • Produce a specific error for 'enum' as constraint #59612
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Json Serialization for DateTime fields in Blazor JS Interop #40440
  • Add additional overloads for RouteValueDictionary ctor #40438
  • Make extensions classes public if the type and fields they 'extend' or access are public #40437
  • Blazor Server - NotAuthorized is shown before Authorized #40435
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #40434
  • Bad http/3 performance in net7 preview1 #40433

Closed

  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #40424

PullRequests

Created

  • Update MvcCoreLoggerExtensions to use LoggerMessageAttribute #40439
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Add missing `BeforeTargets` for IIS local testing #40379
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Use libnethost to find hostfxr #39810
    area-runtime
  • Added API analyzer functionality for conditional return expressions #39242
    stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, area-web-frameworks
  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242
    area-grpc
  • [WIP] Update installer/tests for ARM64 #39523
    area-runtime
  • Enable trimming for Http.Abstractions #40430
  • Cleanup logs after successful test runs #40411
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix DelegationRule to work after receiver restarts #40420
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Bug] The Windows ImageDirectory property is weird and not very user-friendly #886
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • Width and Height value of ContentPage not filled #4915
  • Security in MAUI we need the basic tampering checks #4943
  • [Windows] Grid contained in a frame isn't resizing when window size is dragged larger/smaller #4950
  • .net MAUI on WEB #4941
  • [WinUI] Crashing issue in ScrollView with orientation horizontal #4951
  • .NET MAUI Windows target publishing/archiving #4329
  • net6.0-android generated sources compile error(don't support covariant for return value ) #3867

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove IImageSourceServiceConfiguration #4954
    area/image :framed_picture:, 6.0.300-preview.14

Updated

  • Add more APIs to IDispatcher #4944
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/animation 🎬, p/0, Cost:M, Status:InProgress, 6.0.300-preview.14
